channel.title: CVE Feed for Insteon -- Insteon for Hub

item.title: CVE-2017-5250|2024-08-05T14:55:35.809Z -- insteon -- insteon%20for%20hub
item.description: In version 1.9.7 and prior of Insteon's Insteon for Hub Android app, the OAuth token used by the app to authorize user access is not stored in an encrypted and secure manner.
